title: GiantClub Animset
description: An animation pack made entirely in the Control Rig plugin.
longDescription:
New animation pack made entirely in the Control Rig plugin. This pack is divided into two parts with an instance of equipped and unequipped. 


*Concept Weapon: Giant Club or any heavy weapon


Note: The sequencers are not included in the package, but if you want to have access to them, just send me an email with proof of payment and I will grant you access to the project used to make the animations.


Gameplay Demonstration Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-AgBQIU7iDg&feature=youtu.be

Overview Map: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PRJipN3388w&feature=youtu.be&ab_channel=RookieControlRigger

technicalDetails:
NOTE: Gameplay Print: Assets are not included on this package! Animations only!

Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  23 Attacks Animations (Root and No Root)
  •  8Way Walk, Run, Sprint, StopRun and Roll
  •  Unequiped and Equiped animations.

Rigged to Epic skeleton: (Yes)

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: (Yes)

Number of Animations: 159

Animation types (Root Motion/In-place): 159 (41 Root Motion, 118 in-place)

Number of Characters: 2

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes}

Documentation: No

Important/Additional Notes: The sequencers are not included in the package, but if you want to have access to them, just send me an email with proof of payment and I will grant you access to the project used to make the animations.
